scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_MODE=dev npm run build && npm run pack:prd
scripts.build:stg: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SERVER_MODE=stg npm run build && npm run pack:prd
scripts.build:prd: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production SERVER_MODE=prd npm run build && npm run pack:prd
scripts.pack:prd: mkdir .build && npm run pack:init:source && npm run pack:init:package && npm run pack:init:module
scripts.pack:init:source: cd .build && mkdir source && cd .. && cp -rp .next .build/source && cp -rp public .build/source
scripts.pack:init:package: cat package.json | jq ". | {name: .name, private: true, version: .version, scripts: {start: .scripts.start}, dependencies: .dependencies}" > .build/source/package.json
